Shadow Gear

From NovaRO: Wiki
(Redirected from Shadow Gears)
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Shadow Gears are Equipments that characters can wear on the non-cosmetic Costume Slots. These equipments have various effects, often needing high refine or needing to be combo'd with another Shadow gear.

An example of Shadow Gears on an Arch Bishop Class

On NovaRO, Shadow Gear can be acquired from various sources:

  • Monster Hunter offers Low Rank and High Rank Shadow Gear, which can be received by exchanging various loot from the content.
  • Instances such as Nightmare Toy Factory, Thanatos Tower (Hard), Ancient Laboratory, and Faceworm's Nest (Hard) offer rewards exchangeable for various Shadow Gear.
  • Fields such as Ancient Juperos offer daily quests and field drops that can be exchanged for their own set of Shadow Gear.

All Shadow Gear (with the exception of Low Rank MH Shadow Gear, which can't be refined at all) are refined in a special procedure requiring Shadow Orbs. The full process and details can be reviewed at Shadow Gear Refinement.

Shadow Gears go into their designated Costume Panel Slots as per the table below.

Shadow Gear Upgrading

Klein
NPC Purpose: Shadow Upgrader
Map: The Crow's Nest (@go main)
Coordinates: (main_office 272, 293)Copied!

Certain Shadow Gears can be upgraded by Klein at (main_office 272, 293)Copied!, in exchange for a +5 or higher refine copy of the Shadow Gear, certain materials and a 5,000,000 zeny fee. Shadow Gear upgraded through Klein will retain their current refine, eg. a +7 Hasty Shadow Boots will get upgraded into a +7 Hasty Shadow Boots II.

These upgraded Shadow Gears feature additional effects as well as still having combos with the pieces their base version used to combo with. The upgraded Shadow Gears will also use the Shadow Orb of its base version.

This process is irreversible.
